name: Starter Kit (1.5)
description:
Starter UI kit for web and responsive projects. This is the idea starter kit, very simple but enough to get you started.


For something more complex please check the kit we made for Tailwind CSS for Figma.


Last Update:

  • removed dark mode (will bring back once testing it more)
  • added variants
  • fixed Inter letter-spacing
  • new cover


Kit Includes:

  • Typography
  • Colors
  • Icons
  • Forms (Inputs, Dropdowns, Checkboxes, Radio, Toggles)
  • Sliders
  • Alerts
  • Modal


Please send your feedback at stefan@2dots.co
